alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 05 at 3:25PM EDT until September 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Crawford, Northern Erie and Southern Erie. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered thunderstorms this afternoon through this evening could train over the same areas and produce locally heavy rainfall on already saturated ground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
